title: The best anti-ageing products for your hair
text: Anti-ageing for your hair. Yes, you read that right. By now, you must think you've heard it all - but there's more! If you're beginning to lose your hair, or if it's beginning to thin slightly, or lose the delicious body that it used to have, then look no further. These treatments are specially formulated to stop signs of anti-ageing and nourish your locks. 1. Natural Elements Photo: Natural Elements Natural Elements' all-natural luxury chocolate and vanilla conditioner is an organic solution to dry and damaged hair. With cocoa and vanilla inside this magic bottle, its full of antioxidants, and will add volume and shine to your locks. It's a real good'un for slowing down the ageing process - trust us. £9.99, naturalelementsskincare.com 2. Phytocyane Photo: Phytocyane Particularly recommended for temporary hair loss, this shampoo by Phyto Cyane, with its provitamin B5 and vitamin B6, pumps a healthy dose of anti-ageing into your hair with its grapeseed procyanidins and ginkgo biloba. Shine will be restored to your locks in a splish and a splash. £13.50, feelunique.com 3. Kérastase Photo: Kerastase Kérastase's Lip-Replenishing shampoo is an anti-ageing treatment for hair that's lost its vitality. Bring it back to life after your wash with this - your scalp will be left hydrated, and hair will have all the body it used to have. Bang on. £14.90, feelunique.com 4. Aveda Photo: Aveda Aveda's thickening conditioner contains turmeric, which has been used for thousands of years to treat a variety of conditions and illnesses. Now, it's come for your hair - this will reduce hair loss and help your hair feel healthier and happier for longer. You can't fault it. From £24.50, johnlewis.com 5. Richard Ward Photo: Richard Ward It would have been cheating to have just listed all of Richard Ward's marvellous anti-ageing hair products, but here's the conditioner. He does a whole range, which you can check out here . All brilliant, all anti-ageing, and all highly recommended.
